predictions.article: Farmer sentiment rises as current conditions improve on US farms
predictions.prediction: The Purdue University/CME Group Ag Economy Barometer will decline by at least 10 points in the next month due to increasing concerns about trade policies and declining crop prices.

predictions.article: USDA prepares to protect farmers in a trade war
predictions.prediction: The USDA will distribute at least $5 billion in direct econ
